com.ephesoft.dcma.da.dao

Interface SecurityGroupDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dao<SecurityGroup>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecurityGroupDaoImpl

    public interface SecurityGroupDao
extends Dao<SecurityGroup>
    Provides data accessibility for security group like all super admin groups, all groups etc.
    Version:
    1.0 $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 18-Nov-2013
